description:
This package includes GPPG 1.5.2 and GPLEX 1.2.2 tools for compiling YACC and LEX source files in your C# project.

      After installing this package, just type "Add-Parser MyLanguage" into Package Manager Console to add a new parser in your project and then Build.
      For a working example type "Add-CalculatorExample".

      Take a look at this post for further informations:

      http://ecianciotta-en.abriom.com/2013/08/yacclex-tools-v02.html
releaseNotes:
Changes for v0.2.2:
    * Updated GPPG to version 1.5.2
    * Updated GPLEX to version 1.2.2

Changes for v0.2.1:
    * Resolved issues for installing the package into .Net 2.0 projects
    * Updated GPLEX to version 1.2.1
    * Fixes to installation scripts
      
Known issues:
    * After the package has been upgraded, you have to add the parsers again, otherwise the changes to *.lex and *.y files will not be recompiled. This issue applies for upgrades from versions 0.1.x and 0.2.0
summary: Tools for embedding parsers in your C# project.
title: YACC/LEX tools
